title: The Wheel of Zeit 11/17: OSHA, Ridley Scott, QAnon Shaman, Paul Gosar, David Bowie, Tiger King 2
itunes:title: The Wheel of Zeit 11/17: OSHA, Ridley Scott, QAnon Shaman, Paul Gosar, David Bowie, Tiger King 2
description:
In this edition of The Wheel of Zeit, Jack and Miles discuss OSHA walking back Biden's vaccine mandate, Ridley Scott's thoughts on superhero movies, the QAnon Shaman getting jail time, Paul Gosar getting censured, Iman's thoughts on David Bowie, and 'Tiger King 2' revelations.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
